# Häfele Mesh Local MQTT Integration

This is a Home Assistant Custom Component (HACS integration) for controlling Häfele Mesh lighting devices locally via MQTT.

## Installation via HACS

1. Add this repository as a custom repository in HACS
2. Install "Häfele Mesh Local"
3. Restart Home Assistant
4. Add the integration via Settings → Devices & Services

## Disclaimer
This integration is not officially affiliated with or endorsed by Häfele. Use at your own risk.
